channel.title: CVE Feed for CS Technologies Australia -- Evolution Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CS Technologies Australia -- Evolution Controller

item.title: CVE-2024-29839|2024-06-06T15:47:48.124Z -- cs%20technologies%20australia -- evolution%20controller
item.description: The Web interface of Evolution Controller Versions 2.04.560.31.03.2024 and below contains poorly configured access control on DESKTOP_EDIT_USER_GET_CARD, allowing for an unauthenticated attacker to return the card value data of any user

item.title: CVE-2024-29840|2024-04-14T23:48:05.450Z -- cs%20technologies%20australia -- evolution%20controller
item.description: The Web interface of Evolution Controller Versions 2.04.560.31.03.2024 and below contains poorly configured access control on DESKTOP_EDIT_USER_GET_PIN_FIELDS, allowing for an unauthenticated attacker to return the pin value of any user
